summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 33444, entitled: "An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of 14th Avenue South, from Dallas Avenue to Director Street; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; and providing that the cost of said improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited in the manner provided by law", approved August 3, 1914, and published August 7, 1914; authorizing the dismissal of the action in Superior Court based upon said ordinance, and the payment of all taxable costs.
